heading: HR01820
0: A RESOLUTION COMMENDING THE NATIONAL MAPPING AND RESOURCE INFORMATION AUTHORITY (NAMRIA) FOR THEIR INITIATIVE IN SETTING UP THE GEOPORTAL WEBSITE AND ENTAILING OTHER GOVERNMENT AGENCIES TO SUPPORT THIS INITIATIVE BY SUBMITTING THEIR OWN AGENCY DATASETS FOR INCLUSION IN THE WEBSITE
status: Pending with the Committee on NATURAL RESOURCES since 2018-05-16
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01820
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION COMMENDING THE NATIONAL MAPPING AND RESOURCE INFORMATION AUTHORITY (NAMRIA) FOR THEIR INITIATIVE IN SETTING UP THE GEOPORTAL WEBSITE AND ENTAILING OTHER GOVERNMENT AGENCIES TO SUPPORT THIS INITIATIVE BY SUBMITTING THEIR OWN AGENCY DATASETS FOR INCLUSION IN THE WEBSITE
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-04-19
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON NATURAL RESOURCES ON 2018-05-16
